RT @trevortombe: Today's COVID vaccination update: - Total shots given: 14,284,234 - Shots per 100 people: 37.6 - Shots reported today: 23

In addition, one of the fatalities reported today occurred in February (in an individual under 19 years of age). "This death is being reported upon the completion of an investigation that determined the cause to be COVID-19"

There are some important notes about today's data for SK: 12 cases tested out-of-province were added to the counts today, and 1 death was deemed out-of-province and removed from the count. Accounting for these, 189 new cases and 2 new deaths were reported.

@mpetch @AHS_media @YourAlberta Thank you - we had the Moderna confirmed, but overwrote the value when the rest of the AB Pfizer shipment was confirmed today. Moderna is now included in the deliveries.
Of note, Toronto changed their cut-off time to be significantly more up-to-date today. This means that today's cases for Toronto include data from over a period greater than 24 hrs.

@TVBCRehfer @davidakin Every Public Health Unit reports daily for the provincial total - the total broken down by region just isn't available daily. The site you referenced is ours, so we're familiar with the process.

@TVBCRehfer @davidakin The total number of doses administered yesterday in Ontario, including those administered in Peel, is 120,567. Though regional breakdowns may not be released daily, data for every region *is* included in the daily provincial statistics.
@TVBCRehfer @davidakin The data for Ontario is daily, and the total includes data from every Public Health Unit, every day.
Of note, "five Saskatchewan residents tested out-of-province have been added to the counts". As such, while 205 new cases were identified, the net total has risen by 210.
